Aesop Immaculate Facial Tonic

Brand: Aesop

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Galactoarabinan, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Saccharide Isomerate, Panthenol, Sodium Gluconate, Benzyl Alcohol, Mucor Miehei Extract, Xanthan Gum, Boswellia Carterii Oil, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, F

um Dehydroacetate, Fusanus Spicatus Wood Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phytic Acid, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Farnesol.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
